title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1769/96 of 11 September 1996 concerning the stopping of fishing for cod by vessels flying the flag of Sweden
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1769/96 of 11 September 1996 concerning the stopping of fishing for cod by vessels flying the flag of Sweden
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of cod in the waters of ICES divisions II a (EC-zone), IV by vessels flying the flag of Sweden or registered in Sweden are deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to Sweden for 1996.
Fishing for cod in the waters of ICES divisions II a (EC-zone), IV by vessels flying the flag of Sweden or registered in Sweden is prohibited, as well as the retention on board, the transhipment and the landing of such stock captured by the above mentioned vessels after the date of application of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 24 August 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 September 1996.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 261, 20. 10. 1993, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 301, 14. 12. 1995, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 330, 30. 12. 1995, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 198, 8. 8. 1996, p. 1.
